prompts.vision_analysis_prompt: Analyze this image and describe what you see. Focus on the main object and provide a clear, detailed description that would help create an improved version for educational content for toddlers. Be specific about colors, shapes, and characteristics. Describe what makes this object appealing and how it could be enhanced for children's learning materials.

FORMAT: Single centered icon on plain white background
COMPOSITION: Object-focused, centered, filling 80% of the frame
BACKGROUND: Pure white - NO decorative elements, NO scene elements
TECHNIQUE: Textured crayon strokes with visible paper grain
EDGES: Clear, well-defined edges suitable for background removal
SHAPES: Simple, rounded forms with slightly imperfect hand-drawn lines
